plugin.name: Aardwolf_Client_Help
plugin.author: Kobus and Fiendish
plugin.purpose: Help for Aardwolf MUSHclient Package's more elusive plugin commands

muclient.script:
plugin_list = {}
name_to_id = { ["tick"] = "e50b1d08a0cfc0ee9c44947b", ["soundpack"] = "23832d1089f727f5f34abad8", ["bigmap"] = "60840c9013c7cc57777ae0ac", ["gmcp"] = "3e7dedbe37e44942dd46d264", ["layout"] = "c293f9e7f04dde889f65cb90", ["channels"] = "b555825a4a5700c35fa80780", ["asciimap"] = "3f498d929793c12cb70fb59e", ["group"] = "f178e68512c685b3be1e9b07", ["theme"] = "b9315e040989d3f81f4328d6", ["inventory"] = "0cbb10309587f0ee15ba78ce", ["mapper"] = "b6eae87ccedd84f510b74714", ["echo"] = "55616ea13339bc68e963e1f8", ["updater"] = "162bba4a5ecef2bb32b5652f", ["lockout"] = "b14162092957e88ec16d99e7", ["subgag"] = "48f867c18f6ff1d6d3b52918", ["vitals"] = "d7b7347aefd339a96abb78b0" }
split_col = 30
function help(cmd, text) ColourNote( "khaki", "", " " .. cmd, "lightskyblue", "", string.rep(" ", (split_col - string.len(cmd))) .. text ) end
function subheading(cmd, text) ColourNote( "paleturquoise", "", " " .. cmd, "paleturquoise", "", string.rep(" ", (split_col - string.len(cmd))) .. text ) end
line = string.rep("-", 79)
function aard_help() Note() ColourNote("paleturquoise", "", " Aardwolf MUSHclient Package Hidden Commands") ColourNote("royalblue", "", line) subheading("Plugin Help Command", "Does What") Note()
if is_active("layout") then help("aard layout help", "Miniwindow layouts help") end if is_active("mapper") then help("mapper help", "GMCP mapper plugin help") end if is_active("bigmap") then help("bigmap help", "Bigmap plugin help") end if is_active("tick") then help("aard tick help", "Tick timer plugin help") end if is_active("inventory") then help("inventory serials help", "Inventory serial numbers help") end if is_active("soundpack") then help("sphelp", "Pwar's soundpack plugin help") end if is_active("subgag") then help("#sub help", "Text gag/substitute plugin help") end if is_active("vitals") then help("vitals help", "Shortcuts for displaying player vitals") end
ColourNote("royalblue", "", line) subheading("Misc Command", "Does What") Note()
if is_active("theme") then help("aard theme change", "Miniwindow color themes") end if is_active("channels") then help("chats show / chats hide", "Show/hide the communication log") help("mute [player] / mute clear", "Mutes/unmutes player, displays list, or clears list") end if is_active("echo") then help("chats echo", "List which channels are sent to the main output") end if is_active("group") then help("groupon / groupoff", "Show/hide the group window") end if is_active("lockout") then help("aard input lock", "Lock the keyboard against feline invaders") end if is_active("gmcp") then help("gmcpdebug <0-2>", "Set GMCP debugging verbosity") end help("aard plugins check", "Look for package plugins that aren't loaded") help("aard sounds in background", "Play sounds while client is backgrounded?")
ColourNote("royalblue", "", line) if is_active("updater") then subheading("Version/Update Command", "Does What") Note() help("checkversion", "Check your Aardwolf MUSHclient Package version") help("package update check", "Look online for a package update") ColourNote("royalblue", "", line) end ColourTell("paleturquoise", "", "Find even more help at: ") Hyperlink ( "https://github.com/fiendish/aardwolfclientpackage/wiki", "https://github.com/fiendish/aardwolfclientpackage/wiki", "", "paleturquoise", "", true ) Note() end
function is_active(name) id = name_to_id[name] return GetPluginInfo(id, 17) or false end
function getmemoryusage() collectgarbage('collect') return collectgarbage('count') end
